INTRO.CATCHPHRASE: RAISE A HEALTHIER AND SMARTER CHILD

DESCRIPTION.PARAGRAPH: During their first years of life, infants develop physically, emotionally and cognitively at an amazing speed.
These early acquisitions lay the foundation for later academic, personal and professional achievements.
BabyCloud helps your family and your child, to make the most of this critical developmental period.
BabyCloud is a mobile application that documents, tracks, and helps to improve upon your child’s natural development.
We use cutting-edge technology in AI and cognitive sciences to analyze your child's learning path and propose personalized content to activate his full potential.
We have designed BabyCloud to use the highest cyber security standards available proposed by the biggest institutions in the world (CNIL, MIT, American army) to protect your privacy.
Our security system is regularly tested by third parties to insure and protect your privacy.

BENEFITS.TITLE: For parents who want to activate their child's potential

BENEFIT.DESCRIPTION: Track and record each of your child's different cognitive milestones directly on your phone with BabyCloud's cutting edge technology
Store and  share your child's achievements timeline with your intimate circle of family and friends via pictures, memories, recordings
Use individually selected content created by BabyCloud's developmental specialists to target your child's particular areas of improvement.

STEPS.NAME: Start with the Logger
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Capture your family’s interactions throughout the day and to document the input your child is receiving during their language acquisition stage.

STEPS.NAME: Recharge with the Dock
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: While the logger charges, the dock transfers the recordings to the secure cloud for analysis. Don’t worry, the process is totally secure and encrypted.

STEPS.NAME: Analyze with the Baby SmartBox
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Our existing pipeline (source separation, voice activity detection, speaker diarization) will extract, segment and label stretches of data with communicative activity.

STEPS.NAME: Get informed with the Explorer
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Parents have access to metadata and developmental analytics (child’s first words, language milestones, linguistic and social interactions clips and analyses).

STEPS.NAME: Get involved in “Citizen Science”
STEPS.DESCRIPTION: Ultimately, your contribution will help many children impacted by language or cognitive disorders worldwide.
